DOC.brief_summary: The interferon-free combination regimen Paritaprevir/r - Ombitasvir without Dasabuvir ( ABBVIE REGIMEN ) ± Ribavirin ( RBV ) treatment chronic hepatitis C ( CHC ) show safe effective randomize control clinical trial strict inclusion exclusion criterion well control condition . This observational study first effectiveness research examine ABBVIE REGIMEN ± RBV , use accord local label , real world condition Netherlands clinical practice patient population .
DOC.brief_title: Real World Evidence Effectiveness Paritaprevir/r - Ombitasvir , ± Dasabuvir , ± Ribavirin Patient Support Program Patients With Chronic Hepatitis C ( 3DUTCH )
